input.content: Write a paragraph about the importance of renewable energy. Your response must contain at least 50 words.
Explain how to conduct academic research. Make sure to include the words 'research', 'methodology', and 'analysis' in your response.
Write a short essay about climate change. Start with a title wrapped in << >> and write at least 30 words.
Describe a beautiful sunset without using any commas. Write at least 20 words.
List at least 3 benefits of regular exercise using bullet points.
Write a concluding statement about the importance of education. Start your response with 'In conclusion' and write at least 25 words.
Write about the benefits of healthy eating. Do not use the words 'never', 'always', or 'definitely' in your response.
Write a friendly message to a colleague about an upcoming meeting. End your message with a postscript starting with 'P.S.'
